### *Welcome to my website.*


I am currently a master student at [Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/), majoring in Biostatistics (Theory & Method Track). I graduated from [Shanghai Jiao Tong University](http://en.sjtu.edu.cn/) in June 2017, with a BS in Food Science and Engineering.

Some of my projects during my graduate study in Columbia are [here](projects.html).

For more about my professional and academic experience, please see my  [resume](about.html).

You can contact me via email on the upper-right corner of the page, as well as my Linkedin and Github account. <br>
